name: Azazel
description:
Videogame prototipe made by four students for college and fun!

In this game you play as Azazel, a vampire who has to escape his own castle after the invasion of vampire hunters. Will you spare their lives?

Sneak behind them to suck their blood and transform into a small bat for reaching higher places and crossing through small openings.

Use your wit to solve puzzles and, above all, avoid the lights!

CONTROLS:

Azazel Controls:

Left: Left arrow
Right: Right arrow
Jump: Space

Suck Blood: F
Use mecanism: E

Transform into bat: Shift

Bat controls:

Arrow Keys

Cheats:
B for full blood.
N for next level.

CREDITS:

Programming: Roberto Abad
Programming Assistant: Saúl Parra
Graphics and sounds: Juan Méndez
Game Design: Saúl Parra
Level Design 1, 2 & 3: Saúl Parra
Level Design 4: Miguel Rodríguez
